Name: Men's Running Shoes
Description: Stay light on your feet with SportsFit Men's Running Shoes. Engineered for performance, these shoes feature a breathable mesh upper and responsive cushioning to provide support during your runs. The durable outsole ensures traction on various surfaces, making them perfect for any outdoor activity.

Name: Women's Yoga Pants
Description: Achieve comfort and style with FitStyle Women's Yoga Pants. Crafted from breathable, stretchy fabric, these pants offer maximum flexibility for your workouts. Whether you're at the gym or lounging at home, their flattering fit and stylish design make them a must-have.

Description: Stay stylish with CasualWear Men's T-Shirt. Made from 100% cotton, this t-shirt offers breathability and comfort. It's perfect for casual outings or lounging at home.

Description: Stay warm and stylish with CozyChic Women's Sweater Dress. This dress combines comfort and elegance, perfect for chilly days or casual outings.
